author: James Griffiths, CNN
title: AP report claims China knew of pandemic danger in Wuhan even as officials downplayed risk of virus
description: New questions are being raised over just when China understood the potential severity of the novel coronavirus outbreak in Wuhan, and how long the country's leaders sat on critical information that might have helped stave off a global pandemic.
content: Hong Kong (CNN)New questions are being raised over just when China understood the potential severity of the novel coronavirus outbreak in Wuhan, and how long the country's leaders sat on critical information that might have helped stave off a global pandemic.… [+6873 chars]
